ActWeights and Measures Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the WEIGHTS AND MEASURES REGULATIONS by eliminating definitions without a legal significance, modernizing the formulation of certain articles and by using the exact designation from the Specifications Relating to Non-automatic Weighing Devices (1998).
